column1: innovation_varangian_adventurers_desc0:"What do we owe these lands we live in? Nothing! The realm's heart is its people
column2: and do we not deserve the best soil
column4: the finest palaces? Having them is as simple as #EMP taking#! them!"

column2: there is a strong tradition of public gatherings of all free
column4: where anyone may raise their grievances with the ruler. Of course
column5: for those who stand tall in the eyes of the smallfolk
column6: there can be power in swaying the mob..."

column1: unlocks_authority_cooldown_breaking0:"[characters|E] may break the [crown_authority|E] and [tribal_authority|E] cooldowns at a heavy [prestige|E] cost"
